name: Maze Up !
description:
A Fun MAZE game made during A gamejam.

CONTROLS : 

MOVE LEFT = A/LEFT ARROW 

MOVE RIGHT = D/RIGHT ARROW 

QUIT LEVEL = ESCAPE KEY  

MOVE MOUSE TO LOOK ARROUND  

If You want a more complete,downloadable game,with more interesting levels and more,consider subscribing to my channel. It will encourage me a lot in my devlog

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNrnVYKJnIfetv6v3tN1-1g
